title: How do I turn on or off airplane mode?
answer:
In airplane mode, the wireless network is unavailable. 

 Method 1: On the home screen, touch Settings > More â€¦ and select Airplane mode. To disable airplane mode, deselect Airplane mode. 

 Method 2: Press and hold the power key and touch Airplane mode in the displayed options menu.
